Bash(git -C "c:\\Wordspace\\Prajeen_portfolio" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add UI components library and enhance portfolio styling

- Add shadcn/ui components \(Button, Card, Badge\) with utilities
- Enhance all home components with improved animations and styling
- Update Navigation with better responsive design
- Refine AboutPage and ProjectsPage layouts
- Update Tailwind config with extended theme options
- Add vite config files

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Wordspace\\Prajeen_portfolio" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

The Email card in social links already provides mailto functionality.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Wordspace\\Prajeen_portfolio" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

- Wrap Get in Touch button with Link component for proper routing
